type.name: cl_bool
type.comment: WARNING! Unlike cl_ types in cl_platform.h, cl_bool is not guaranteed to be the same size as the bool in kernels.

require.comment: OpenCL 1.0 APIs that were deprecated in OpenCL 1.1

#ifdef CL_USE_DEPRECATED_OPENCL_1_0_APIS /* * WARNING: * This API introduces mutable state into the OpenCL implementation. It has been REMOVED * to better facilitate thread safety. The 1.0 API is not thread safe. It is not tested by the * OpenCL 1.1 conformance test, and consequently may not work or may not work dependably. * It is likely to be non-performant. Use of this API is not advised. Use at your own risk. * * Software developers previously relying on this API are instructed to set the command queue * properties when creating the queue, instead. */ #endif /* CL_USE_DEPRECATED_OPENCL_1_0_APIS */
OpenCL 1.0 APIs that were deprecated in OpenCL 1.2
OpenCL 1.0 cl_device_info enums that were deprecated in OpenCL 1.2
OpenCL 1.0 APIs that were deprecated in OpenCL 2.0
OpenCL 1.0 cl_device_info enums that were deprecated in OpenCL 2.0
OpenCL 1.1 cl_device_info enums that were deprecated in OpenCL 2.0
OpenCL 1.1 cl_device_info enums that were deprecated in OpenCL 3.0
OpenCL 1.2 cl_image_info enums that were deprecated in OpenCL 2.0
OpenCL 2.2 Program Object APIs that were deprecated in OpenCL 3.0
OpenCL 2.2 cl_program_info enums that were deprecated in OpenCL 3.0
